guardian.title: Isis fighters in suicide attack on Iraqi air base
guardian.topComment: " so lads tell us again....how did your attack go today ? "

guardian.title: Oregon governor John Kitzhaber to resign over 'surreal' corruption scandal
guardian.topComment: His ex-wife must be laughing her ass off... What a knee-slapper! He runs off with a power-hottie, 20 years his junior and now has to suffer the consequences of partnering with a corrupt manipulator. I guess it doesn't matter whether you're a Democrat...

guardian.title: Argentina's president may face charges over alleged terrorist attack cover-up
guardian.topComment: So now she knows that Botox can't hide everything.
